document.full_text: mr. savage, with his trademark sunglasses, bandannas and raspy voice, was one of the most recognizable professional wrestlers of the 1980s and '90s as the character macho man.
document.title: randy savage, pro wrestling's macho man, dies at 58
lines_and_colors: mr. savage, with his trademark sunglasses, bandannas and raspy voice, was one of the most recognizable professional wrestlers of the 1980s and '90s as the character macho man.
